page.title: 20MARYKIRK FLOWER SHOW
page.content: At the{Marykirk Flower}and {Industrial Show}held in the village hall in August, people from Marykirk district enter competitions like best kept garden, tallest sunflower, best vegetables or best jar of strawberry jam. The competitions are split into sections. This is an example of possible entries from the children's section. Section 6 Children 11-15 years 33 4 pieces coconut ice 34 Article in canvas work 35 Clothes peg doll or model 36 Local view (sketched) Some sections are more popular than others. The highest number of entries is in the flower and vegetable sections and the lowest is in the children's sections.
